name: Screen Writer: Business Card RPG
description:
A solo TTRPG where you're a screenwriter. You write a manuscript, which either becomes a success or becomes too expensive.

The game requires 3d6, but 4d6 are recommended. It's designed to play alone, but you can play it with others by taking turns describing scenes.

There are two versions of the game: Tutorial and Pro. Tutorial contains the explanation on how to play the game, and will guide you through the first rounds of the game. Pro contains only the bare minimum to run the game.

Print on a 85x55mm business card for the best experience.

This is a submission to the Pleasure-Not-Business Card RPG Jam.
